answers.answer: He was big for 3 weeks early! Congrats on your little blessing!
Oh my I'm in the same boat but they are only inducing me a week ahead of time. I envy you, Congrats though momma ♡
Yes congrats my baby was 3 weeks early to and also 9 pounds so i get what your saying

question: I was induced 3 weeks early after having pre eclampsia, gestational diabetes and a large baby. Pretty rubbish 3rd trimester for me. But after a nice pretty quick for a ftm labour of 15hrs an epidural which took and hour to fit and an episiotomy I gave birth to my son henry at a healthy 8lb 10oz had a stay in neonatal after some problems breathing and bad jaundice but we are now at home and all is going amazing!! Xx
title: He's finally here!!
